display_graph module¶

Created on Tue Jun 22 16:10:03 2021

@author: matte

display_graph.get_historical_data(data_file_name)[source]¶

Get the data from the all the API files in the folder ‘historical_data’

Parameters

data_file_name (list) – The list of names for all the API files in the folder.

Returns

Lists of traffic status and dates (Y-month-day).

Return type

list

display_graph.graph_creation()[source]¶

Creates the graph and a .png file in the static folder

Returns

Nothing, display the graph and creates an image.png in the static folder.

display_graph.separate_categories(traffic_data, dates_list)[source]¶

Separate every traffic point into categories lists

Parameters

  • traffic_data (list) – The list of numbers that represent the status for each file.

  • dates_list (list) – The list of dates for each file.

Returns

8 lists, date and status for the 4 possibilities.

Return type

list
